text: Francisco Hernández de Córdoba (died 1517) was a Spanish conquistador, known to history mainly for the ill-fated expedition he led in 1517, in the course of which the first European accounts of the Yucatán Peninsula were compiled. ==English-language references== * ; online English edition * == Other websites == * Discovery of Yucatán , on the Mexican web site redescolar . * Discovery of Yucatán , on México desconocido. Category:1517 deaths Category:History of Mesoamerica Category:Spanish explorers Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Francisco Hernández de Córdoba (Yucatán conquistador)
